name: Nail Art Opoly
description:
Nail art is a creative way to paint, decorate, enhance, and embellish the nails. Nail Art Opoly is a fun, colorful property trading board game all about buying, trading, and selling uniquely beautiful nail art designs. With over 3 boards to choose from, you won't be bored playing this game. Download and play Nail Art Opoly today!

Game Features:
* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game

Optional Game Features:
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* 3 additional boards
